headline: MDLZ Q1 Deep Dive: Cocoa Inflation Drives Pricing Actions, U.S. Demand Remains Soft
summary: Packaged snacks company Mondelez (NASDAQ:MDLZ) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales were flat year on year at $9.31 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.74 per share was 12.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
